newsitem.title: ZAIRE: Zaire names team for talks with rebels.
newsitem.headline: Zaire names team for talks with rebels.

text.p: A seven-member team led by President Mobutu Sese Seko's security adviser will represent Zaire's government at talks with rebels in South Africa this week, state television reported.

The team, which includes Foreign Minister Kamanda wa Kamanda and representatives of both the opposition and the president's supporters in the transitional parliament, will travel to South Africa on Thursday, it added in a report late on Monday.
